title: nike ad font?
content:
does somebody know this typefont?  
 [http://www.nike.com/nikebasketball/usa/v4/features/air\_max360/downloads/...](http://web.archive.org/web/20141104203754/http:/www.nike.com/nikebasketball/usa/v4/features/air_max360/downloads/air_max_360_basketball.jpg "http://www.nike.com/nikebasketball/usa/v4/features/air\_max360/downloads/air\_max\_360\_basketball.jpg")

pleeeaaase
author: bigballer

comments.content: A tightly spaced, slightly heavier [Futura Extra Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20141104203754/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/futura_std_extra_bold_condensed/?sample_text=BALL%20ON%20AIR.&sample_size=60)
